titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an George Edward Moore, [13. 5. 1935]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original bei Timothy Moore; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (deutsch: Briefe, S. 188; Cambridge Letters, S. 258).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: I'm not going to send Miss Ambrose to you this afternoon. On second thought I dont think it would be the right thing. If you will allow me I shall see you tomorrow.
